short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings back the G+ link to the Google Bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why have to click twice to get to Google+ when you can click just once! (Not counting the amount of click it took for you to install this extension.) This handy extension brings the link back to your Google Bar on ALL google pages including the homepage on Chrome.

This extension is completely open source and can be found here: https://gitlab.stevenmattera.com/LepidusDevelopment/ReturnOfThePlus
